about_the_game: Step into the shoes of a first responder and experience the challenge of saving lives in virtual reality! In this realistic and intense VR experience, you will be faced with a selection of emergency situations where quick thinking and decisive actions are crucial. You will be tasked with assessing patient conditions, applying tourniquets, managing airways, and performing other basic but life-saving first-aid procedures. The VR environment will put you in the heart of the action, giving you the opportunity to test your skills and knowledge in a safe and controlled environment. Whether you're a seasoned first responder or just looking to learn more about emergency response, this VR experience will challenge and educate you. Get ready to make a difference and save lives! #VRFirstResponder #SaveLives.
detailed_description:
Are you a first responder and want more?

EmergiSim works with civilian and military organisations worldwide with the goal of zero preventable deaths at the point of injury. We provide education and scenario training in Mass Casualty Incidents, TECC, TCCC, Aeromedical Retrieval and Prolonged Field Care along with a suite of EMS-specific training. Join our Steam Community to learn more.


About the Software

Step into the shoes of a first responder and experience the challenge of saving lives in virtual reality! In this realistic and intense VR experience, you will be faced with a selection of emergency situations where quick thinking and decisive actions are crucial. You will be tasked with assessing patient conditions, applying tourniquets, managing airways, and performing other basic but life-saving first-aid procedures. The VR environment will put you in the heart of the action, giving you the opportunity to test your skills and knowledge in a safe and controlled environment. Whether you're a seasoned first responder or just looking to learn more about emergency response, this VR experience will challenge and educate you. Get ready to make a difference and save lives! #VRFirstResponder #SaveLives.
